BIO

I recently graduated from Binghamton University with a concentration in business administration and finance. I quickly realized I was more interested in the intersection between technology and business. I took a leap of faith and committed to Fullstack Academy, a 17-week long software immersive. I became comfortable working in an agile team environment and became familiar with the different stages of the development lifecycle. Moving forward, I look to bring my past experiences bolstered with my new skills to make meaningful contributions in my next role. Here is my full resume.
